verses.verse: Maschil <WH4905> of Asaph. <WH623> O God, <WH430> why <WH4100> have you cast <WH2186> us off for ever? <WH5331> why does your anger <WH639> smoke <WH6225> against the sheep <WH6629> of your pasture? <WH4830>

Remember <WH2142> your congregation, <WH5712> which you have purchased <WH7069> of old; <WH6924> the rod <WH7626> of your inheritance, <WH5159> which you have redeemed; <WH1350> this <WH2088> mount <WH2022> Zion, <WH6726> wherein you have dwelled. <WH7931>
Lift <WH7311> up your feet <WH6471> to the perpetual <WH5331> desolations; <WH4876> even all <WH3605> that the enemy <WH341> has done wickedly <WH7489> in the sanctuary. <WH6944>
Your enemies <WH6887> roar <WH7580> in the middle <WH7130> of your congregations; <WH4150> they set <WH7760> up their ensigns <WH226> for signs. <WH226>
A man was famous <WH3045> according as he had lifted <WH935> up axes <WH7134> on the thick <WH5441> trees. <WH6086>
But now <WH6258> they break <WH1986> down the carved <WH6603> work <WH6603> thereof at <WH3162> once with axes <WH3781> and hammers. <WH3597>
They have cast <WH7971> fire <WH784> into your sanctuary, <WH4720> they have defiled <WH2490> by casting down the dwelling <WH4908> place of your name <WH8034> to the ground. <WH776>
They said <WH559> in their hearts, <WH3820> Let us destroy <WH3238> them together: <WH3162> they have burned <WH8313> up all <WH3605> the synagogues <WH4150> of God <WH410> in the land. <WH776>
We see <WH7200> not our signs: <WH226> there is no <WH369> more <WH5750> any prophet: <WH5030> neither <WH3808> is there among <WH854> us any that knows <WH3045> how <WH5704> long. <WH5704>
O God, <WH430> how <WH5704> long <WH5704> shall the adversary <WH6862> reproach? <WH2778> shall the enemy <WH341> blaspheme <WH5006> your name <WH8034> for ever? <WH5331>
Why <WH4100> withdraw <WH7725> you your hand, <WH3027> even your right <WH3225> hand? <WH3225> pluck <WH3615> it out of your bosom. <WH2436>
For God <WH430> is my King <WH4428> of old, <WH6924> working <WH6466> salvation <WH3444> in the middle <WH7130> of the earth. <WH776>
You did divide <WH6565> the sea <WH3220> by your strength: <WH5797> you brake <WH7665> the heads <WH7218> of the dragons <WH8577> in the waters. <WH4325>
You brake <WH7533> the heads <WH7218> of leviathan <WH3882> in pieces, and gave <WH5414> him to be meat <WH3978> to the people <WH5971> inhabiting <WH6728> the wilderness. <WH6728>
You did split <WH1234> the fountain <WH4599> and the flood: <WH5158> you dried <WH3001> up mighty <WH386> rivers. <WH5104>
The day <WH3117> is yours, the night <WH3915> also <WH637> is yours: you have prepared <WH3559> the light <WH3974> and the sun. <WH8121>
You have set <WH5324> all <WH3605> the borders <WH1367> of the earth: <WH776> you have made <WH3335> summer <WH7019> and winter. <WH2779>
Remember <WH2142> this, <WH2063> that the enemy <WH341> has reproached, <WH2778> O LORD, <WH3068> and that the foolish <WH5036> people <WH5971> have blasphemed <WH5006> your name. <WH8034>
O deliver <WH5414> not the soul <WH5315> of your turtledove <WH8449> to the multitude <WH2416> of the wicked: forget <WH7911> not the congregation <WH2416> of your poor <WH6041> for ever. <WH5331>
Have respect <WH5027> to the covenant: <WH1285> for the dark <WH4285> places of the earth <WH776> are full <WH4390> of the habitations <WH4999> of cruelty. <WH2555>
O let not the oppressed <WH1790> return <WH7725> ashamed: <WH3637> let the poor <WH6041> and needy <WH34> praise <WH1984> your name. <WH8034>
Arise, <WH6965> O God, <WH430> plead <WH7378> your own cause: <WH7379> remember <WH2142> how the foolish <WH5036> man reproaches <WH2781> you daily. <WH3605> <WH3117>
Forget <WH7911> not the voice <WH6963> of your enemies: <WH6887> the tumult <WH7588> of those that rise <WH6965> up against you increases <WH5927> continually. <WH8548>
